DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the effect of Atazanavir 400 mg QD and Atazanavir/Ritonavir 300/100 mg QD at steady state on the single dose pharmacokinetics of RGZ in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Atazanavir Administered With and Without Ritonavir and a Cytochrome P450 Substrate Rosiglitazone
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects between the ages 18 to 50 years old with a BMI 18 to 32 kg/m2
